import React from 'react'; import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; import './Home.css'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const { ref: heroRef, inView: heroInView } = useInView({ triggerOnce: true }); const { ref: whyRef, inView: whyInView } = useInView({ triggerOnce: true }); const { ref: coursesRef, inView: coursesInView } = useInView({ triggerOnce: true }); return (

); }; export default Home;
